Text: REDUNDANCYIn some areas of ENE people are doing the work person could do Is this magnified throughout ENE as numerous people in other departments have claimed Shouldnt we be reassessing our manpower needs on a broader basis to cover the real needs This would result in a reduction of manpower but employees without real jobs to do have low moral which adversely impacts the whole company The ultimate result would be a stronger company both financially professionally

VOLUNTARY TERMINATIONKEN Why dont you announce you are accepting volunteers for termination and full severance like you did in London You can save ENE money make people happy I am sure the staff that remains will be happier also
